scripts.pre-commit: concurrently  -p "[{name}]" -n "Utils,Backend,Frontend,Common,Changelog" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,magenta.bold" "yarn --cwd utils run pre-commit" "yarn --cwd backend run pre-commit"  "yarn --cwd frontend run pre-commit" "yarn --cwd common run pre-commit" "yarn run auto-changelog"
scripts.test: concurrently  -p "[{name}]" -n "Utils,Backend,Frontend,Common" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,magenta.bold" "yarn --cwd utils  run test" "yarn --cwd backend run backend-test"  "yarn --cwd frontend  run frontend-test" "yarn --cwd common run common-test"
